events.message: Received the application from the candidate who applied for the software engineer position. The resume highlights strong experience in backend development.
Categorised the candidate under Engineering as the CV shows expertise in full-stack software development and relevant devops knowledge.
Assigned recruiter John Smith to manage the hiring process for this software engineer position. He will take over communication with the candidate.
Completed initial phone screening with the candidate. They demonstrated solid understanding of software development principles and core programming languages.
Candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm about the role and the upcoming interview stages.
Scheduled the on-site technical interview for next Monday at 10 AM. Interview panel consists of lead developers and a DevOps engineer.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, showing excellent problem-solving skills and deep knowledge of software architecture.
HR interview has been scheduled for Wednesday at 3 PM to discuss company culture fit and salary expectations.
HR interview completed with positive feedback; candidate aligns with company values and is clear about compensation requirements.
Extended a formal job offer to the candidate including comprehensive benefits and a competitive salary package.
Received positive feedback from the candidate who expressed strong interest in joining the engineering team and accepted the offer terms.
Candidate has officially accepted the job offer and confirmed the start date in early June for the software engineer role.
Onboarding process has started with completion of paperwork, IT setup, and introduction to the engineering team.
The hiring process is now closed successfully with the candidate fully integrated and productive in their new software engineer position.
